resources.string:
Press the green plus button to add a new climb log. 

Use the Navigation buttons to: 
• See your profile, which has your stats. 
• See your recently climbed routes.

Lead Programmer: Chris Dilley 

Android Developer and UI Design: Austin Snoeyink 

Database Administrator and Climbing Consultant: David Michel 

Database Developer: Javin Unger 

Graphic Designer and Testing Coordinator: Jacob Meyer 

UI Consultant: Alison Kane

You can use this page to log a recent climb. 
To accomplish this, 

1. Type in a route name in the "Route Name" section. 

2. Select the type of climb from the "Type" drop-down menu. 

3. Select the difficulty of the climb from the "Difficulty" drop-down menu. 

4. Select the color of the route from the "Color" drop-down menu. 

5. Type in any comments about the climb in the "Notes" section. 

6. Finally, press the "Log It" button to submit the log.
